sentences.english: It is a big party for Dao people and other nations.
sentences.chinese: 盘王节简直就是瑶族人和其他名族的一个大聚会。

sentences.english: Yao has become the most grand festival.
sentences.chinese: 现已成为全国瑶族同胞最盛大的节日。

sentences.english: The Customary Law has a unique position and special meaning in their development history.
sentences.chinese: 石牌制在瑶族发展史上有着独特的地位和特殊的意义。

sentences.english: Panhu and Wang Yao is set totem worship and ancestor worship.
sentences.chinese: 而盘瓠和盘王是瑶族的图腾崇拜和祖先崇拜。

sentences.english: The Yao culture is the important force to cohere the Yao people.
sentences.chinese: 瑶族文化是凝聚瑶族人民的重要力量。

sentences.english: The Yao culture is the important force to cohere the Yao people.
sentences.chinese: 瑶族文化是凝聚瑶族人民的重要力量。

sentences.english: She has formed a single nationality community in the North and South Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 早在南北朝时期瑶族就形成了单一的民族共同体。
